title: Share Buttons
shortDescription: Get your content shared online with AddThis.
longDescription: The Share Buttons app from AddThis is the easiest way to add sidebar share buttons to your website and get your content distributed to over 200 social media channels, smart-sorted for your visitors. - Display between 1-10 share services, customized for your website visitors. - Sidebar optimized for desktop and mobile. - Configure your desktop sidebar on the left or right, and mobile sidebar on the top or bottom. - Option to display share counts and control your buttons' size and style. For more details, check out AddThis' official Cloudflare landing page or our handy How To Install video. Note: At this time, existing AddThis users are unable to connect addthis.com accounts with Share Buttons for Cloudflare Apps. If you're interested in this feature (or others!), let us know.
instructions: By installing this app, you certify that you are at least 16 years old and agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
author: AddThis

desktopPosition.description: Select position of share buttons to show on a desktop.
desktopPosition.title: Desktop Position

mobileButtonSize.description: Select the size for share buttons displayed on a mobile devices.
mobileButtonSize.title: Mobile Button Size

mobilePosition.description: Select position of share buttons to show on a mobile device.
mobilePosition.title: Mobile Position

numPreferredServices.description: Select number (between 1 to 10) of preferred services to display. The services that are displayed for the share buttons are different for each individual user that visits your site. This is based on the user’s past sharing history and the services that are most popular.
numPreferredServices.title: Number of Service

theme.description: Select the theme for share buttons (background and contrasting color).
theme.title: Theme

versions.releaseNotes: Bug fix, updated app listing copy.

proposedApp.title: Share Buttons
proposedApp.shortDescription: Get your content shared online with AddThis.
proposedApp.longDescription: The Share Buttons app from AddThis is the easiest way to add sidebar share buttons to your website and get your content distributed to over 200 social media channels, smart-sorted for your visitors. - Display between 1-10 share services, customized for your website visitors. - Sidebar optimized for desktop and mobile. - Configure your desktop sidebar on the left or right, and mobile sidebar on the top or bottom. - Option to display share counts and control your buttons' size and style. For more details, check out AddThis' official Cloudflare landing page or our handy How To Install video. Note: At this time, existing AddThis users are unable to connect addthis.com accounts with Share Buttons for Cloudflare Apps. If you're interested in this feature (or others!), let us know.
proposedApp.instructions: By installing this app, you certify that you are at least 16 years old and agree to our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
proposedApp.author: AddThis
